step1.title: Define your project rules

outcome1.title: Shared decisions based on real contributions
outcome1.description: AngoraSix provides a governance system based on ownership. The more someone gives to the project, the more weight their vote has in key decisions. Fair, without hierarchies or conflict.
outcome1.imageAlt: Visualization of the governance system with contribution-weighted voting

outcome2.title: Automated, secure, and transparent income management
outcome2.description: We connect your project to a multi-signature shared wallet that automatically distributes income based on real contributions. Everyone receives what they truly earned.
outcome2.imageAlt: Fund distribution screen showing automatic payments based on contributions
